      • deleteData

        public abstract void deleteData(java.lang.String key,
                                java.lang.Object value,
                                java.lang.String containerName)
        Deletes a data where they key is equals to a value in a specified container Container.reloadFromStorage() should be called after!
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the filter
        containerName - the containername

      • getData

        public abstract java.util.List<ContainerData> getData(Container container)
        Parameters:
        container - the container to get the data from
        Returns:
        all data for a Container

      • applyChanges

        public abstract void applyChanges()
        Applies changes to the database, like creating tables, handling insertion etc. Basically it will go through the queue and handle the changes. Deletion is not handled here!
